answers.answer: Have you ever been tested for possibility of being hypothyroid?  If so, please post thyroid test results and reference ranges shown on the lab report, so that members can comment on adequacy of testing and test results.

Yes I take 100mcg of Synthroid.  I will get the results from my doctor and share them.  I've been seeing my doctor every week now and having at least 7 viles of blood taken twice a month.She can't seem to figure out why the so much weight gain, so fast.  Now I have discharge in my breasts and some one told me it could me "False Pregnancy".  Weird!!!

Very interested in seeing what testing has been done and where results fall within the reference ranges.  In the interim, I thought you might be interested in reading this link to a letter written by a good thyroid doctor.http://hormonerestoration.com/files/ThyroidPMD.pdf

question: I have gained 35 pounds in 3 months and overall I have gained 50 pounds in one year.I went from not being able to get out from underneath the heating blanket to having hot flashes.  Now I have both problems.My feet are swollen and I don't have diabetes.My breasts are discharging as if I was pregnant (I'm not though)I have have digestive problems, GERD, Irritable Bowel Syndrome (It runs in the family)I take 100mcg of Synthroid and I am a white female, age 44
title: Thyroid or Adrenial Problems
